hasMenuItem.name: Iced Pumpkin Chai Latte
hasMenuItem.description: Cool off with an iced pumpkin chai latte. This refreshing drink combines spiced chai tea with creamy pumpkin puree and a touch of vanilla, served over ice and topped with a hint of cinnamon. It’s a perfect blend of autumn flavors with a chilled twist.

hasMenuItem.name: Caramel Pumpkin Spice Latte
hasMenuItem.description: Indulge in the warm, cozy flavors of fall with this hot caramel pumpkin spice drink. A rich blend of creamy pumpkin, sweet caramel, and aromatic spices, it’s topped with whipped cream and a drizzle of caramel for a perfect seasonal treat.

hasMenuItem.name: Cinnamon Dolce Latte
hasMenuItem.description: Savor the essence of cinnamon with this hot cinnamon dolce latte. A smooth espresso blend meets frothy steamed milk, sweetened with rich cinnamon syrup and finished with a sprinkle of cinnamon on top. It’s a cozy, spiced treat that’s perfect for warming up your day.

hasMenuItem.name: Pumpkin Spice Latte
hasMenuItem.description: Enjoy the quintessential fall flavor with a hot pumpkin spice latte. This classic drink features smooth espresso blended with creamy steamed milk, rich pumpkin puree, and a blend of warm spices like cinnamon and nutmeg, topped with a sprinkle of pumpkin pie spice. It’s a seasonal favorite that wraps you in cozy comfort.

hasMenuItem.name: Iced Caramel Pumpkin Spice Latte
hasMenuItem.description: Cool off with an iced caramel pumpkin spice drink. This refreshing beverage combines chilled espresso with creamy pumpkin, sweet caramel, and a blend of warm spices, all served over ice and topped with whipped cream and a caramel drizzle. It’s a delightful fall treat with a refreshing twist.

hasMenuItem.name: Iced Cinnamon Dolce Latte
hasMenuItem.description: Enjoy a chilled take on a classic with an iced cinnamon dolce latte. This refreshing drink blends chilled espresso with creamy milk and sweet cinnamon dolce syrup, served over ice and finished with a sprinkle of cinnamon for a cool, spiced treat.

hasMenuItem.name: Iced Hazelnut Mocha
hasMenuItem.description: Savor the cool blend of an iced hazelnut mocha. Chilled espresso is combined with rich chocolate and toasted hazelnut syrup, mixed with creamy milk, and served over ice. It's a refreshing, nutty, and chocolaty indulgence perfect for any time of year.

hasMenuItem.name: Iced Pumpkin Spice Latte
hasMenuItem.description: Refresh yourself with an iced pumpkin spice latte. This chilled treat blends smooth espresso with creamy pumpkin and warming spices, all poured over ice and finished with a touch of whipped cream and a sprinkle of pumpkin pie spice. It’s a cool, flavorful fall favorite.

hasMenuItem.name: Hazelnut Mocha
hasMenuItem.description: Delight in the rich fusion of flavors with a hot hazelnut mocha. This indulgent drink combines velvety espresso with creamy chocolate and toasted hazelnut syrup, all topped with frothy steamed milk and a dusting of cocoa. It's a decadent, nutty twist on a classic mocha.

hasMenuItem.name: Pumpkin Chai Latte
hasMenuItem.description: Embrace autumn with a hot pumpkin chai latte. This comforting beverage blends spicy chai tea with creamy pumpkin puree and a hint of sweet vanilla, topped with frothy milk and a sprinkle of cinnamon. It’s the perfect fall fusion of spiced warmth and creamy indulgence.

review.reviewBody: Simple & delicious cafe, pastry and coffee! ❤️
Always amazing! I order from here regularly and its great quality every time.

Honestly, it's too expensive for what you get. Pictures on the menu are completely the opposite of the portions that you received. They're so small and tiny. The carrot cake was old, it was like a rock. Taste is ok
I was surprised that the Strawberry Swirl Cheesecake is so small. But everything is delicious.

So delicious! We haven't ordered from here in a while and their menu looks to have grown. The spinach and feta filo is easily twice the size of the picture (massive!) and it was delicious. Better than some spanokopita I've ordered from greek restaurants in the past! Couldn't finish it because it was so big, so I haven't tried all of the things we ordered yet. Partner ordered the panini and said it was really tasty- the prosciutto's saltiness was balanced by the tomato and lettuce. 

I ordered the caramel frappe (never tried a frappe, I usually like iced coffee) and it was a bit too sweet for me, but that's just a personal preference and if you know you like frappes, I assume you would like Dario's as well. Even though it was too sweet for my personal tastes, it was well-made (smooth and creamy, nice presentation with the caramel drizzle in the cup, and it was filled up to the top as well). My partner tried a sip and he didn't think it was too sweet, so again, it's personal preference!
As for the matcha frappe (partner ordered it), it was not sweet enough for him, but it was sweet enough for me. 

I also love that they have lactose free/dairy free options for their coffee. Will definitely order from here again! (We've also ordered the Gelato in the past and it was delicious too!)
